name: MIS Age of Prisoners on a Selected Day
description:
Shows which prisoners have occupied a particular location for a range of dates entered at runtime along with the Age of the prisoner and Religion Changes between the selected dates. To retrieve an accurate figure for Age of prisoners on a given day you will need to select the same day for the start and End Date (Transfer Date) at runtime.
ACC0059 v1.0 Last Modified:02/07/2020

dataset.name: Location Occupancy History
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME, MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_CODE, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_CODE, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH.BOOKING_NUMBER FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_TO_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_TO_CELL.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_TO_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code:','A','Cell Moves\Movement Location To Establishment Code',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND ((TRUNC((AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_TIME)) <= (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Occupancy End Date:','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:58) */) AND AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME IS NULL) OR (TRUNC((AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_TIME)) <= (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Occupancy End Date:','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:58) */) AND AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME >= (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Occupancy Start Date:','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:57) */)))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME, MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_CODE, 'Not Specified'), COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, 'Not Specified'), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH.BOOKING_NUMBER), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, INITIALS, ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ETHNIC_CODE, RELIGION_CODE, RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, BOOKING_NUMBER, 'TBD' AS V_TRUNCATE_DAYS_BETWEEN FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @prompt('Establishment Code:','A','Cell Moves\Movement Location To Establishment Code',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0)

field.name: ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME
field.display: Movement Assignment End Date and Time (Internal)

dataset.name: Religion History
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_DIM_RELIGION.RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_DIM_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_DESCRIPTION_PREVIOUS, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.RELIGION_START_DATE) AS RELIGION_START_DATE, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.RELIGION_END_DATE) AS RELIGION_END_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_CODE, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH.BOOKING_NUMBER FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_RELIGION AT_DIM_RELIGION, BODIMIS.DIM_RELIGION AT_DIM_PREVIOUS_RELIGION, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION, BODIMIS.FACT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_TO_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_TO_CELL.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_TO_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.RELIGION_SK = AT_DIM_RELIGION.RELIGION_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.RELIGION_START_DATE = AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.RELIGION_END_DATE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.RELIGION_SK = AT_DIM_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.RELIGION_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (MOVEMENT_TO_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code:','A','Cell Moves\Movement Location To Establishment Code',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.RELIGION_END_DATE >= (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Occupancy Start Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.RELIGION_END_DATE <= (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Occupancy End Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Persistent,,User:2) */) AND ((TRUNC((AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_TIME)) <= (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Occupancy End Date:','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:58) */) AND AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME IS NULL) OR (TRUNC((AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_TIME)) <= (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Occupancy End Date:','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:58) */) AND AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.ASSIGNMENT_END_TIME >= (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Occupancy Start Date:','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:57) */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_PREVIOUS_RELIGION.RELIGION_SK <> -1 AND AT_DIM_RELIGION.RELIGION_SK <> -1))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, INITIALS, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, RELIGION_DESCRIPTION_PREVIOUS, RELIGION_START_DATE, RELIGION_END_DATE, ETHNIC_CODE, RELIGION_CODE, BOOKING_NUMBER, 'TBD' AS V_TRUNCATE_DAYS_BETWEEN, V_RELIGION__PREV AS V_RELIGION_PREV_DISPLAY, V_RELIGION_NEW AS V_RELIGION_NEW_DISPLAY, 'TBD' AS V_RELIGION_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @prompt('Establishment Code:','A','Cell Moves\Movement Location To Establishment Code',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0)

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
